metadata.title: Data Sources - Configuration Language
metadata.description: Data sources allow Terraform to use external data, function output, and data from other configurations. Learn data resource arguments, behavior, and lifecycle.

attributes will show as "computed" in the plan since the values are not yet
known.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
